apple_vendor_description: Showcasing a tender embrace on Apple devices, this emoji features a couple with medium and medium-dark skin tones, united by a radiant heart.  Apple's characteristic glossy finish and subtle gradients lend a lifelike quality to the figures and the symbolic heart, emphasizing their bond.  It's a beautiful representation of love and companionship as rendered with Apple's distinct artistic touch, ideal for conveying deep affection.
